summary: The Protect Our Judiciary Act of 2025 seeks to amend Title 18 of the United States Code to prohibit picketing or parading near the buildings or residences of judges, jurors, witnesses, or court officers. The bill aims to protect these individuals by making it a federal crime to engage in such activities, including the use of sound trucks or other demonstrations in these areas. Violators could face fines, imprisonment, or both.
